name: Gum Battle
description:
Welcome to Gum Battle!

Squish baddies and make it to the final level. Watch out, level two turns out the lights, and in level three you'll need to put your climbing skills to the test. WASD to move and jump. Use the arrow keys to climb ropes. Press spacebar to restart levels.

Created by a student of the Game Generator class at Tulsa Community College.
